segment.source: You can save your current Enterprise Mode compatibility site list as an XML file, for distribution and use by your managed systems.
segment.target: You can save your current Enterprise Mode compatibility site list as an XML file, for distribution and use by your managed systems.

segment.source: Save your site list to XML in the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Save your site list to XML in the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Save your site list to XML in the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager
segment.target: Save your site list to XML in the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 8.1
segment.target: Windows 8.1

segment.source: Windows 7
segment.target: Windows 7

segment.source: Windows Server 2012 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2012 R2

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)

segment.source: You can save your current Enterprise Mode compatibility site list as an XML file, for distribution and use by your managed systems.
segment.target: You can save your current Enterprise Mode compatibility site list as an XML file, for distribution and use by your managed systems.

segment.source: To save your list as XML
segment.target: To save your list as XML

segment.source: On the File menu of the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager, click Save to XML.
segment.target: On the File menu of the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager, click Save to XML.

segment.source: Save the file to the location you specified in your Enterprise Mode registry key, set up when you turned on Enterprise Mode for use in your company.
segment.target: Save the file to the location you specified in your Enterprise Mode registry key, set up when you turned on Enterprise Mode for use in your company.

segment.source: For information about the Enterprise Mode registry key, see Turn on local control and logging for Enterprise Mode.
segment.target: For information about the Enterprise Mode registry key, see Turn on local control and logging for Enterprise Mode.

segment.source: The first time a user starts Internet Explorer 11 on a managed device; Internet Explorer will look for a new version of the site list at the specified location.
segment.target: The first time a user starts Internet Explorer 11 on a managed device; Internet Explorer will look for a new version of the site list at the specified location.

segment.source: If the browser finds an updated site list, IE downloads the new XML site list and uses it.
segment.target: If the browser finds an updated site list, IE downloads the new XML site list and uses it.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.2)

segment.target: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.1)
